replies.body: Opinions on Hamsters and should they join the politics?
replies.body_tagged: Opinions on Hamsters and should they join the politics?

replies.body:
Cheeky bl0ke

Budah - my best friend in the team and a player who I can always rely on.

FALCON - a great player and honestly is one of my favourite people in the team despite not speaking that often due to timezones.

Raging - another good friend who we I trust.

Zeus - Haven't spoken to him in a little while, but he's improved loads.

Seuth - improved loads in Apollo and a nice guy to talk to, commonly accused and honestly I have given up trying to appeal him, despite countering every piece of evidence.

Spooks - improved loads since joining and is reliable at a lot of positiions, I probably underrate him

Eric - pretty similar to spooks

Jive - idk why I'm so far down the list and I haven't mentioned it, but he's a good all rounder 

Ryan - good defender squeaky and annoying sometimes but he's nice to talk to 

Aura - reliable all round and can play everywhere. I underrate him.

Eteh - reliable at pvp but needs a lot to work on game knowledge

Peachy, sli, pizza and venny I just don't know how to order them since I don't very often see them play but they are all good friends and nice guys to talk to.
replies.body_tagged:
Cheeky bl0ke

Budah - my best friend in the team and a player who I can always rely on.

FALCON - a great player and honestly is one of my favourite people in the team despite not speaking that often due to timezones.

Raging - another good friend who we I trust.

Zeus - Haven't spoken to him in a little while, but he's improved loads.

Seuth - improved loads in Apollo and a nice guy to talk to, commonly accused and honestly I have given up trying to appeal him, despite countering every piece of evidence.

Spooks - improved loads since joining and is reliable at a lot of positiions, I probably underrate him

Eric - pretty similar to spooks

Jive - idk why I'm so far down the list and I haven't mentioned it, but he's a good all rounder 

Ryan - good defender squeaky and annoying sometimes but he's nice to talk to 

Aura - reliable all round and can play everywhere. I underrate him.

Eteh - reliable at pvp but needs a lot to work on game knowledge

Peachy, sli, pizza and venny I just don't know how to order them since I don't very often see them play but they are all good friends and nice guys to talk to.
